item.title: 【Cinema Center】MOVIE - 101.Dalmatians.1961.1080p.DSNP.WEB-DL.DDP5.1.H.264-Samuel
item.description:
101 Dalmatians

Alternate Artwork 1 | Alternate Artwork 2 | Alternate Artwork 3 | Alternate Artwork 4 | Alternate Artwork 5 | Alternate Artwork 6 | Alternate Artwork 7 | Alternate Artwork 8 | Alternate Artwork 9 | Alternate Artwork 10 | Alternate Artwork 11 | Poster 1 | Poster 2 | Poster 3 | Poster 4 | Poster 5 | Poster 6 | Thumbnail 1 | Thumbnail 2 | Thumbnail 3 | Key Art


1961 • 1h 22m
Family, Animation, Action-Adventure

Description
Pongo and Perdita lead a heroic cast of animal characters on a dramatic quest to rescue their Dalmatian puppies from the villainous Cruella De Vil.
Click to expand...
Trailers

101 Dalmatians Trailer
Click to expand...
More Information
Long Description:
Walt Disney's original classic has charmed audiences for generations with its irresistible tail-wagging stars, memorable story and wonderful blend of humor and adventure. Cruella De Vil, Disney's most outrageous villain, sets the fur-raising adventure in motion when she dognaps all of the Dalmatian puppies in London, including 15 from Pongo and Perdita's family. Through the power of the "Twilight Bark," Pongo leads a heroic cast of animal characters on a dramatic quest to rescue them all. Contains tobacco depictions.
Duration: 1h 22m
Release Date: 1961
Genre: Family, Animation, Action-Adventure
Rating:
Director: Wolfgang Reitherman, Hamilton S. Luske, Clyde Geronimi
Starring: Rod Taylor, J. Pat O'Malley, Betty Lou Gerson, Martha Wentworth, Ben Wright, Cate Bauer
Click to expand...
